actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Foreign Agriculture Programs

official_title: To amend the Bill Emerson Humanitarian Trust Act to provide clarification with respect to the period of time for which funds may be held in the trust established under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Bill Emerson Humanitarian Trust Act to permit funds to be held in the food security commodity trust for such time as the Secretary of Agriculture determines to be appropriate.

titles.title: To amend the Bill Emerson Humanitarian Trust Act to provide clarification with respect to the period of time for which funds may be held in the trust established under that Act.
